content:
I've added your earbuds to the list. Here's the updated checklist:

**Clothing:**

* Comfortable walking shoes or sneakers
* Socks
* Lightweight pants or shorts
* Breathable top or t-shirt
* Sweater or light jacket (depending on the weather)
* Hat and sunglasses (if it's going to be sunny)
* Extra socks and underwear (just in case)

**Food and Drinks:**

* Water bottle or hydration pack
* Snacks (e.g., fruits, energy bars, trail mix, sandwiches)
* Lunch (if you don't plan to buy food at the park)
* Cooler with refreshing drinks (if you have a cooler bag)

**Park Essentials:**

* Map or guide of the park
* Sunscreen and insect repellent
* First-aid kit (with essentials like band-aids, antiseptic wipes, pain relievers)
* Trash bag (for cleaning up after your picnic or snacks)
* Camera or phone for capturing memories

**Electronics:**

* Laptop
* Notebooks
* Phone and portable charger (in case you need to make calls or take more photos)
* Earbuds

**Personal Items:**

* Wallet (RFID-blocking, with credit cards, driver's license, and cash)
* Medications and any personal care items you may need
* Small toiletry bag with essentials (e.g., hand sanitizer, tissues)

**Miscellaneous:**

* Cash or credit cards (for parking, food, or souvenirs)
* Small umbrella or rain jacket (if there's a chance of rain)
* Entertainment (e.g., books, games, or a portable speaker)

Now you're all set to enjoy your music while taking in the scenery at the park! Remember to keep your earbuds safe and secure in your Fjallraven Kanken backpack when you're not using them. Have a great trip!
